messages.author: stoyan
messages.text: Perhaps uintptr_t instead of uint8* (here and below) to avoid hassles with overflow with signed pointer arithmetic.

messages.author: stoyan
messages.text: (address < range_end) seems superfluous having (address + sizeof(StructureType) < range_end)

messages.author: Sigurður Ásgeirsson
messages.text:
On 2010/02/04 19:35:21, stoyan wrote:
> Perhaps uintptr_t instead of uint8* (here and below) to avoid hassles with
> overflow with signed pointer arithmetic.

Done.

messages.author: Sigurður Ásgeirsson
messages.text:
On 2010/02/04 19:35:21, stoyan wrote:
> (address < range_end) seems superfluous having (address + sizeof(StructureType)
> < range_end)

Done.
